original_text: In the morning sow your seed, and at evening withhold not your hand, for you do not know which will prosper, this or that, or whether both alike will be good.
korean_text: 너는 아침에 씨를 뿌리고 저녁에도 손을 놓지 말라 이것이 잘 될는지, 저것이 잘 될는지, 혹 둘이 다 잘 될는지 알지 못함이니라

sentences.original_text: In the morning sow your seed
at evening withhold not your hand
for you do not know which will prosper
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 것이 형통할지 너는 알지 못하니

sentences.original_text: whether both alike will be good
